main event: A half round object was observed hovering 12 feet off the ground over Seneca Lake, NY, on January 29, 1954.
interesting points: The object had a yellowish color with a bluish-red top,The sighting was observed for a total of 5 minutes,The object reappeared later at an altitude of 10,900 feet,The flight pattern was described as jerky and evasive,The report indicated various conclusions regarding its identity, including the possibility of being a balloon.
sighted object: half round object with yellowish color and bluish-red top
